8th year of the benefit anti-fascist festival near the river at September 16th ùó¶ùóßùóîùó•ùóß ùü≠ùüÆ:ùü¨ùü¨ 5 stages, 30 bands, 15 Djs, workshops, vegan food + afterparty September 17th. 

üí≤ TICKETSüí≤
We want this festival with an antifascist message to be accessible to people regardless of finances. We will be happy for any solidarity contribution, recommended from ùüêùüìùüé ùêúùê≥ùê§ / ùüèùüé ùêû to ùü≤ùü≤ùü≤ ùó∞ùòáùó∏ / ùüÆùü≤,ùü≤ùü≤ ùó≤. If you don't have a penny, come anyway, I'll be happy if you dance! We will not leave anyone in front of the club.

üí≤ Your contributions, after deducting the necessary costs, will be donated to help autonomous collectives that fight against Russian fascism and imperialism both on the war front and in the background: Anarchist Black Cross Belarus and Solidarity Collectives Ukraine.
‚ö´ https://abc-belarus.org/en/main-page
‚ö´ https://www.solidaritycollectives.org/en/about-us

MANIFESTO:
‚ùó Riot Over River is an anti-fascist festival that declares the slogan: We are NOT ALONE in the fight against racism, fascism, queer/homophobia or climate injustice!
‚ùó And in the same way, the autonomous collectives in Ukraine and Belarus, which face Russian imperialism at the front and in everyday life, are not alone in the fight against fascism. We feel the need to support our friends from Solidarity Collectives in Ukraine and ABC Belarus financially with earnings from the festival and, above all, symbolically - to spread information and determination that even if it is sometimes extremely difficult and there are many battles on many fronts, there are still people and collectives that support these struggles. Our weapon is solidarity anywhere in the world!
‚ùó This year at the festival you will meet both bands & DJs from all over Europe, as well as a wide range of information stands of autonomous collectives, DIY publishing houses, lectures, workshops and even a poetr. Also look forward to a benefit vegan meal from Food Not Bombs to support people fleeing war and a benefit Zapatista coffee for the ≈Ωivot bez krutosti (Cruelty-Free Life) Asylum, which helps abused animals.
‚ùó At Riot, we try to create a safe space where you can meet, network, educate, strengthen friendships and most importantly - inspire each other and give each other the courage to face all the injustices. We can organize and face it all TOGETHER!

üî• Sexist and homophobic behavior and insinuations are not tolerated at the event!

üî• The event takes place in the legendary club CROSS - 2 minutes from tram and metro stop "C" N√°dra≈æ√≠ Hole≈°ovice, where night tram 94 also runs back to the city center. https://www.crossclub.cz/cs/kontakt

üî• Do you want to put up some posters in your city? I will be happy to send them by post or hand them over in person in Prague and Brno! The poster can be downloaded and printed here at the link: https://1url.cz/@plakatyROR8

ü§ù The event is organized by Mad Duck booking, Cross Club, people from Saturday groups Food Not Bombs Prague and the autonomous collective Vegan Burger Days.

Want to get involved? Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

We offer absolutely FREE space WITHOUT RENT for all merch stands, entertainment, independent workshops, info stands, non-profits... Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

- Please leave larger bags and backpacks in the cloakroom (CZK 30 each).

8th year of the benefit anti-fascist festival near the river at September 16th ùó¶ùóßùóîùó•ùóß ùü≠ùüÆ:ùü¨ùü¨ 5 stages, 30 bands, 15 Djs, workshops, vegan food + afterparty September 17th. 

üí≤ TICKETSüí≤
We want this festival with an antifascist message to be accessible to people regardless of finances. We will be happy for any solidarity contribution, recommended from ùüêùüìùüé ùêúùê≥ùê§ / ùüèùüé ùêû to ùü≤ùü≤ùü≤ ùó∞ùòáùó∏ / ùüÆùü≤,ùü≤ùü≤ ùó≤. If you don't have a penny, come anyway, I'll be happy if you dance! We will not leave anyone in front of the club.

üí≤ Your contributions, after deducting the necessary costs, will be donated to help autonomous collectives that fight against Russian fascism and imperialism both on the war front and in the background: Anarchist Black Cross Belarus and Solidarity Collectives Ukraine.
‚ö´ https://abc-belarus.org/en/main-page
‚ö´ https://www.solidaritycollectives.org/en/about-us

MANIFESTO:
‚ùó Riot Over River is an anti-fascist festival that declares the slogan: We are NOT ALONE in the fight against racism, fascism, queer/homophobia or climate injustice!
‚ùó And in the same way, the autonomous collectives in Ukraine and Belarus, which face Russian imperialism at the front and in everyday life, are not alone in the fight against fascism. We feel the need to support our friends from Solidarity Collectives in Ukraine and ABC Belarus financially with earnings from the festival and, above all, symbolically - to spread information and determination that even if it is sometimes extremely difficult and there are many battles on many fronts, there are still people and collectives that support these struggles. Our weapon is solidarity anywhere in the world!
‚ùó This year at the festival you will meet both bands & DJs from all over Europe, as well as a wide range of information stands of autonomous collectives, DIY publishing houses, lectures, workshops and even a poetr. Also look forward to a benefit vegan meal from Food Not Bombs to support people fleeing war and a benefit Zapatista coffee for the ≈Ωivot bez krutosti (Cruelty-Free Life) Asylum, which helps abused animals.
‚ùó At Riot, we try to create a safe space where you can meet, network, educate, strengthen friendships and most importantly - inspire each other and give each other the courage to face all the injustices. We can organize and face it all TOGETHER!

üî• Sexist and homophobic behavior and insinuations are not tolerated at the event!

üî• The event takes place in the legendary club CROSS - 2 minutes from tram and metro stop "C" N√°dra≈æ√≠ Hole≈°ovice, where night tram 94 also runs back to the city center. https://www.crossclub.cz/cs/kontakt

üî• Do you want to put up some posters in your city? I will be happy to send them by post or hand them over in person in Prague and Brno! The poster can be downloaded and printed here at the link: https://1url.cz/@plakatyROR8

ü§ù The event is organized by Mad Duck booking, Cross Club, people from Saturday groups Food Not Bombs Prague and the autonomous collective Vegan Burger Days.

Want to get involved? Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

We offer absolutely FREE space WITHOUT RENT for all merch stands, entertainment, independent workshops, info stands, non-profits... Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

‚ù§Ô∏è please ‚ù§Ô∏è
- Do not bring your dogs to the event. If necessary, the dog is only allowed on a leash and with a muzzle on the outdoor stage, NOT in the club.
- Please do not bring your own alcohol and weapons to the event. You will be politely asked to check at the entrance.
- Please leave larger bags and backpacks in the cloakroom (CZK 30 each).

üí≤ Your contributions, after deducting the necessary costs, will be donated to help autonomous collectives that fight against Russian fascism and imperialism both on the war front and in the background: Anarchist Black Cross Belarus and Solidarity Collectives Ukraine.
‚ö´ https://abc-belarus.org/en/main-page
‚ö´ https://www.solidaritycollectives.org/en/about-us

MANIFESTO:
‚ùó Riot Over River is an anti-fascist festival that declares the slogan: We are NOT ALONE in the fight against racism, fascism, queer/homophobia or climate injustice!
‚ùó And in the same way, the autonomous collectives in Ukraine and Belarus, which face Russian imperialism at the front and in everyday life, are not alone in the fight against fascism. We feel the need to support our friends from Solidarity Collectives in Ukraine and ABC Belarus financially with earnings from the festival and, above all, symbolically - to spread information and determination that even if it is sometimes extremely difficult and there are many battles on many fronts, there are still people and collectives that support these struggles. Our weapon is solidarity anywhere in the world!
‚ùó This year at the festival you will meet both bands & DJs from all over Europe, as well as a wide range of information stands of autonomous collectives, DIY publishing houses, lectures, workshops and even a poetr. Also look forward to a benefit vegan meal from Food Not Bombs to support people fleeing war and a benefit Zapatista coffee for the ≈Ωivot bez krutosti (Cruelty-Free Life) Asylum, which helps abused animals.
‚ùó At Riot, we try to create a safe space where you can meet, network, educate, strengthen friendships and most importantly - inspire each other and give each other the courage to face all the injustices. We can organize and face it all TOGETHER!

üî• Sexist and homophobic behavior and insinuations are not tolerated at the event!

üî• The event takes place in the legendary club CROSS - 2 minutes from tram and metro stop "C" N√°dra≈æ√≠ Hole≈°ovice, where night tram 94 also runs back to the city center. https://www.crossclub.cz/cs/kontakt

üî• Do you want to put up some posters in your city? I will be happy to send them by post or hand them over in person in Prague and Brno! The poster can be downloaded and printed here at the link: https://1url.cz/@plakatyROR8

ü§ù The event is organized by Mad Duck booking, Cross Club, people from Saturday groups Food Not Bombs Prague and the autonomous collective Vegan Burger Days.

Want to get involved? Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

We offer absolutely FREE space WITHOUT RENT for all merch stands, entertainment, independent workshops, info stands, non-profits... Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

‚ù§Ô∏è please ‚ù§Ô∏è
- Do not bring your dogs to the event. If necessary, the dog is only allowed on a leash and with a muzzle on the outdoor stage, NOT in the club.
- Please do not bring your own alcohol and weapons to the event. You will be politely asked to check at the entrance.
- Please leave larger bags and backpacks in the cloakroom (CZK 30 each).

8th year of the benefit anti-fascist festival near the river at September 16th ùó¶ùóßùóîùó•ùóß ùü≠ùüÆ:ùü¨ùü¨ 5 stages, 30 bands, 15 Djs, workshops, vegan food + afterparty September 17th. 

üí≤ TICKETSüí≤
We want this festival with an antifascist message to be accessible to people regardless of finances. We will be happy for any solidarity contribution, recommended from ùüêùüìùüé ùêúùê≥ùê§ / ùüèùüé ùêû to ùü≤ùü≤ùü≤ ùó∞ùòáùó∏ / ùüÆùü≤,ùü≤ùü≤ ùó≤. It's up to you how you can and want to support. If you think about how much is the optimal donation, how about ùü∞ùü¨ùü¨/ùüèùüî ùêû? If you don't have a penny, come anyway, I'll be happy if you dance! We will not leave anyone in front of the club.

üí≤ Your contributions, after deducting the necessary costs, will be donated to help autonomous collectives that fight against Russian fascism and imperialism both on the war front and in the background: Anarchist Black Cross Belarus and Solidarity Collectives Ukraine.
‚ö´ https://abc-belarus.org/en/main-page
‚ö´ https://www.solidaritycollectives.org/en/about-us

MANIFESTO:
‚ùó Riot Over River is an anti-fascist festival that declares the slogan: We are NOT ALONE in the fight against racism, fascism, queer/homophobia or climate injustice!
‚ùó And in the same way, the autonomous collectives in Ukraine and Belarus, which face Russian imperialism at the front and in everyday life, are not alone in the fight against fascism. We feel the need to support our friends from Solidarity Collectives in Ukraine and ABC Belarus financially with earnings from the festival and, above all, symbolically - to spread information and determination that even if it is sometimes extremely difficult and there are many battles on many fronts, there are still people and collectives that support these struggles. Our weapon is solidarity anywhere in the world!
‚ùó This year at the festival you will meet both bands & DJs from all over Europe, as well as a wide range of information stands of autonomous collectives, DIY publishing houses, lectures, workshops and even a poetr. Also look forward to a benefit vegan meal from Food Not Bombs to support people fleeing war and a benefit Zapatista coffee for the ≈Ωivot bez krutosti (Cruelty-Free Life) Asylum, which helps abused animals.
‚ùó At Riot, we try to create a safe space where you can meet, network, educate, strengthen friendships and most importantly - inspire each other and give each other the courage to face all the injustices. We can organize and face it all TOGETHER!

üî• Sexist and homophobic behavior and insinuations are not tolerated at the event!

üî• The event takes place in the legendary club CROSS - 2 minutes from tram and metro stop "C" N√°dra≈æ√≠ Hole≈°ovice, where night tram 94 also runs back to the city center. https://www.crossclub.cz/cs/kontakt

üî• Do you want to put up some posters in your city? I will be happy to send them by post or hand them over in person in Prague and Brno! The poster can be downloaded and printed here at the link: https://1url.cz/@plakatyROR8

ü§ù The event is organized by Mad Duck booking, Cross Club, people from Saturday groups Food Not Bombs Prague and the autonomous collective Vegan Burger Days.

Want to get involved? Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

We offer absolutely FREE space WITHOUT RENT for all merch stands, entertainment, independent workshops, info stands, non-profits... Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

‚ù§Ô∏è please ‚ù§Ô∏è
- Do not bring your dogs to the event. If necessary, the dog is only allowed on a leash and with a muzzle on the outdoor stage, NOT in the club.
- Please do not bring your own alcohol and weapons to the event. You will be politely asked to check at the entrance.
- Please leave larger bags and backpacks in the cloakroom (CZK 30 each).

8th year of the benefit anti-fascist festival near the river at September 16th ùó¶ùóßùóîùó•ùóß ùü≠ùüÆ:ùü¨ùü¨ 5 stages, 30 bands, 15 Djs, workshops, vegan food + afterparty September 17th. 

üí≤ TICKETSüí≤
We want this festival with an antifascist message to be accessible to people regardless of finances. We will be happy for any solidarity contribution, recommended from ùüêùüìùüé ùêúùê≥ùê§ / ùüèùüé ùêû to ùü≤ùü≤ùü≤ ùó∞ùòáùó∏ / ùüÆùü≤,ùü≤ùü≤ ùó≤. If you don't have a penny, come anyway, I'll be happy if you dance! We will not leave anyone in front of the club.

üí≤ Your contributions, after deducting the necessary costs, will be donated to help autonomous collectives that fight against Russian fascism and imperialism both on the war front and in the background: Anarchist Black Cross Belarus and Solidarity Collectives Ukraine.

MANIFESTO:
‚ùó Riot Over River is an anti-fascist festival that declares the slogan: We are NOT ALONE in the fight against racism, fascism, queer/homophobia or climate injustice!
‚ùó And in the same way, the autonomous collectives in Ukraine and Belarus, which face Russian imperialism at the front and in everyday life, are not alone in the fight against fascism. We feel the need to support our friends from Solidarity Collectives in Ukraine and ABC Belarus financially with earnings from the festival and, above all, symbolically - to spread information and determination that even if it is sometimes extremely difficult and there are many battles on many fronts, there are still people and collectives that support these struggles. Our weapon is solidarity anywhere in the world!
‚ùó This year at the festival you will meet both bands & DJs from all over Europe, as well as a wide range of information stands of autonomous collectives, DIY publishing houses, lectures, workshops and even a poetr. Also look forward to a benefit vegan meal from Food Not Bombs to support people fleeing war and a benefit Zapatista coffee for the ≈Ωivot bez krutosti (Cruelty-Free Life) Asylum, which helps abused animals.
‚ùó At Riot, we try to create a safe space where you can meet, network, educate, strengthen friendships and most importantly - inspire each other and give each other the courage to face all the injustices. We can organize and face it all TOGETHER!

üî• Sexist and homophobic behavior and insinuations are not tolerated at the event!

üî• The event takes place in the legendary club CROSS - 2 minutes from tram and metro stop "C" N√°dra≈æ√≠ Hole≈°ovice, where night tram 94 also runs back to the city center. https://www.crossclub.cz/cs/kontakt

üî• Do you want to put up some posters in your city? I will be happy to send them by post or hand them over in person in Prague and Brno! The poster can be downloaded and printed here at the link: https://1url.cz/@plakatyROR8

ü§ù The event is organized by Mad Duck booking, Cross Club, people from Saturday groups Food Not Bombs Prague and the autonomous collective Vegan Burger Days.

Want to get involved? Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

We offer absolutely FREE space WITHOUT RENT for all merch stands, entertainment, independent workshops, info stands, non-profits... Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

‚ù§Ô∏è please ‚ù§Ô∏è
- Do not bring your dogs to the event. If necessary, the dog is only allowed on a leash and with a muzzle on the outdoor stage, NOT in the club.
- Please do not bring your own alcohol and weapons to the event. You will be politely asked to check at the entrance.
- Please leave larger bags and backpacks in the cloakroom (CZK 30 each).

We will be happy for any solidarity contribution, recommended from ùüêùüìùüé ùêúùê≥ùê§ / ùüèùüé ùêû to ùü≤ùü≤ùü≤ ùó∞ùòáùó∏ / ùüÆùü≤,ùü≤ùü≤ ùó≤. MANIFESTO:
‚ùó Riot Over River is an anti-fascist festival that declares the slogan: We are NOT ALONE in the fight against racism, fascism, queer/homophobia or climate injustice!
‚ùó And in the same way, the autonomous collectives in Ukraine and Belarus, which face Russian imperialism at the front and in everyday life, are not alone in the fight against fascism. We feel the need to support our friends from Solidarity Collectives in Ukraine and ABC Belarus financially with earnings from the festival and, above all, symbolically - to spread information and determination that even if it is sometimes extremely difficult and there are many battles on many fronts, there are still people and collectives that support these struggles. Our weapon is solidarity anywhere in the world!
‚ùó This year at the festival you will meet both bands & DJs from all over Europe, as well as a wide range of information stands of autonomous collectives, DIY publishing houses, lectures, workshops and even a poetr. Also look forward to a benefit vegan meal from Food Not Bombs to support people fleeing war and a benefit Zapatista coffee for the ≈Ωivot bez krutosti (Cruelty-Free Life) Asylum, which helps abused animals.
‚ùó At Riot, we try to create a safe space where you can meet, network, educate, strengthen friendships and most importantly - inspire each other and give each other the courage to face all the injustices. We can organize and face it all TOGETHER!

üî• Sexist and homophobic behavior and insinuations are not tolerated at the event!

üî• The event takes place in the legendary club CROSS - 2 minutes from tram and metro stop "C" N√°dra≈æ√≠ Hole≈°ovice, where night tram 94 also runs back to the city center. https://www.crossclub.cz/cs/kontakt

üî• Do you want to put up some posters in your city? I will be happy to send them by post or hand them over in person in Prague and Brno! The poster can be downloaded and printed here at the link: https://1url.cz/@plakatyROR8

ü§ù The event is organized by Mad Duck booking, Cross Club, people from Saturday groups Food Not Bombs Prague and the autonomous collective Vegan Burger Days.

Want to get involved? Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

We offer absolutely FREE space WITHOUT RENT for all merch stands, entertainment, independent workshops, info stands, non-profits... Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

‚ù§Ô∏è please ‚ù§Ô∏è
- Do not bring your dogs to the event. If necessary, the dog is only allowed on a leash and with a muzzle on the outdoor stage, NOT in the club.
- Please do not bring your own alcohol and weapons to the event. You will be politely asked to check at the entrance.
- Please leave larger bags and backpacks in the cloakroom (CZK 30 each).

‚ùó Na Riotu se sna≈æ√≠me vytv√°≈ôet bezpeƒçn√Ω prostor, kde se lze setk√°vat, s√≠≈•ovat, vzdƒõl√°vat, utu≈æovat p≈ô√°telstv√≠ a hlavnƒõ - vz√°jemnƒõ se inspirovat a dod√°vat si odvahu ƒçelit v≈°em tƒõm nespravedlnostem. M≈Ø≈æeme se organizovat a postavit se tomu v≈°emu SPOLEƒåNƒö!

8th year of the benefit anti-fascist festival near the river at September 16th ùó¶ùóßùóîùó•ùóß ùü≠ùüÆ:ùü¨ùü¨ 5 stages, 30 bands, 15 Djs, workshops, vegan food + afterparty September 17th. 

üí≤ TICKETSüí≤
We want this festival with an antifascist message to be accessible to people regardless of finances. We will be happy for any solidarity contribution, recommended from ùüêùüìùüé ùêúùê≥ùê§ / ùüèùüé ùêû to ùü≤ùü≤ùü≤ ùó∞ùòáùó∏ / ùüÆùü≤,ùü≤ùü≤ ùó≤. If you don't have a penny, come anyway, I'll be happy if you dance! We will not leave anyone in front of the club.

üí≤ Your contributions, after deducting the necessary costs, will be donated to help autonomous collectives that fight against Russian fascism and imperialism both on the war front and in the background: Anarchist Black Cross Belarus and Solidarity Collectives Ukraine.
‚ö´ https://abc-belarus.org/en/main-page
‚ö´ https://www.solidaritycollectives.org/en/about-us

MANIFESTO:
‚ùó Riot Over River is an anti-fascist festival that declares the slogan: We are NOT ALONE in the fight against racism, fascism, queer/homophobia or climate injustice!
‚ùó And in the same way, the autonomous collectives in Ukraine and Belarus, which face Russian imperialism at the front and in everyday life, are not alone in the fight against fascism. We feel the need to support our friends from Solidarity Collectives in Ukraine and ABC Belarus financially with earnings from the festival and, above all, symbolically - to spread information and determination that even if it is sometimes extremely difficult and there are many battles on many fronts, there are still people and collectives that support these struggles. Our weapon is solidarity anywhere in the world!
‚ùó This year at the festival you will meet both bands & DJs from all over Europe, as well as a wide range of information stands of autonomous collectives, DIY publishing houses, lectures, workshops and even a poetr. Also look forward to a benefit vegan meal from Food Not Bombs to support people fleeing war and a benefit Zapatista coffee for the ≈Ωivot bez krutosti (Cruelty-Free Life) Asylum, which helps abused animals.
‚ùó At Riot, we try to create a safe space where you can meet, network, educate, strengthen friendships and most importantly - inspire each other and give each other the courage to face all the injustices. We can organize and face it all TOGETHER!

üî• Sexist and homophobic behavior and insinuations are not tolerated at the event!

üî• The event takes place in the legendary club CROSS - 2 minutes from tram and metro stop "C" N√°dra≈æ√≠ Hole≈°ovice, where night tram 94 also runs back to the city center. https://www.crossclub.cz/cs/kontakt

üî• Do you want to put up some posters in your city? I will be happy to send them by post or hand them over in person in Prague and Brno! The poster can be downloaded and printed here at the link: https://1url.cz/@plakatyROR8

ü§ù The event is organized by Mad Duck booking, Cross Club, people from Saturday groups Food Not Bombs Prague and the autonomous collective Vegan Burger Days.

Want to get involved? Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

We offer absolutely FREE space WITHOUT RENT for all merch stands, entertainment, independent workshops, info stands, non-profits... Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

‚ù§Ô∏è please ‚ù§Ô∏è

8th year of the benefit anti-fascist festival near the river at September 16th ùó¶ùóßùóîùó•ùóß ùü≠ùüÆ:ùü¨ùü¨ 5 stages, 30 bands, 15 Djs, workshops, vegan food + afterparty September 17th. 

üí≤ TICKETSüí≤
We want this festival with an antifascist message to be accessible to people regardless of finances. We will be happy for any solidarity contribution, recommended from ùüêùüìùüé ùêúùê≥ùê§ / ùüèùüé ùêû to ùü≤ùü≤ùü≤ ùó∞ùòáùó∏ / ùüÆùü≤,ùü≤ùü≤ ùó≤. It's up to you how you can and want to support. If you think about how much is the optimal donation, how about ùü∞ùü¨ùü¨/ùüèùüî ùêû? If you don't have a penny, come anyway, I'll be happy if you dance! We will not leave anyone in front of the club.

üí≤ Your contributions, after deducting the necessary costs, will be donated to help autonomous collectives that fight against Russian fascism and imperialism both on the war front and in the background: Anarchist Black Cross Belarus and Solidarity Collectives Ukraine.
‚ö´ https://abc-belarus.org/en/main-page
‚ö´ https://www.solidaritycollectives.org/en/about-us

MANIFESTO:
‚ùó Riot Over River is an anti-fascist festival that declares the slogan: We are NOT ALONE in the fight against racism, fascism, queer/homophobia or climate injustice!
‚ùó And in the same way, the autonomous collectives in Ukraine and Belarus, which face Russian imperialism at the front and in everyday life, are not alone in the fight against fascism. We feel the need to support our friends from Solidarity Collectives in Ukraine and ABC Belarus financially with earnings from the festival and, above all, symbolically - to spread information and determination that even if it is sometimes extremely difficult and there are many battles on many fronts, there are still people and collectives that support these struggles. Our weapon is solidarity anywhere in the world!
‚ùó This year at the festival you will meet both bands & DJs from all over Europe, as well as a wide range of information stands of autonomous collectives, DIY publishing houses, lectures, workshops and even a poetr. Also look forward to a benefit vegan meal from Food Not Bombs to support people fleeing war and a benefit Zapatista coffee for the ≈Ωivot bez krutosti (Cruelty-Free Life) Asylum, which helps abused animals.
‚ùó At Riot, we try to create a safe space where you can meet, network, educate, strengthen friendships and most importantly - inspire each other and give each other the courage to face all the injustices. We can organize and face it all TOGETHER!

üî• Sexist and homophobic behavior and insinuations are not tolerated at the event!

üî• The event takes place in the legendary club CROSS - 2 minutes from tram and metro stop "C" N√°dra≈æ√≠ Hole≈°ovice, where night tram 94 also runs back to the city center. https://www.crossclub.cz/cs/kontakt

üî• Do you want to put up some posters in your city? I will be happy to send them by post or hand them over in person in Prague and Brno! The poster can be downloaded and printed here at the link: https://1url.cz/@plakatyROR8

ü§ù The event is organized by Mad Duck booking, Cross Club, people from Saturday groups Food Not Bombs Prague and the autonomous collective Vegan Burger Days.

Want to get involved? Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

We offer absolutely FREE space WITHOUT RENT for all merch stands, entertainment, independent workshops, info stands, non-profits... Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net

‚ù§Ô∏è please ‚ù§Ô∏è
- Do not bring your dogs to the event. If necessary, the dog is only allowed on a leash and with a muzzle on the outdoor stage, NOT in the club.
- Please do not bring your own alcohol and weapons to the event. You will be politely asked to check at the entrance.
- Please leave larger bags and backpacks in the cloakroom (CZK 30 each).

MANIFESTO:
‚ùó Riot Over River is an anti-fascist festival that declares the slogan: We are NOT ALONE in the fight against racism, fascism, queer/homophobia or climate injustice!
‚ùó And in the same way, the autonomous collectives in Ukraine and Belarus, which face Russian imperialism at the front and in everyday life, are not alone in the fight against fascism. We feel the need to support our friends from Solidarity Collectives in Ukraine and ABC Belarus financially with earnings from the festival and, above all, symbolically - to spread information and determination that even if it is sometimes extremely difficult and there are many battles on many fronts, there are still people and collectives that support these struggles. Our weapon is solidarity anywhere in the world!
‚ùó This year at the festival you will meet both bands & DJs from all over Europe, as well as a wide range of information stands of autonomous collectives, DIY publishing houses, lectures, workshops and even a poetr. Also look forward to a benefit vegan meal from Food Not Bombs to support people fleeing war and a benefit Zapatista coffee for the ≈Ωivot bez krutosti (Cruelty-Free Life) Asylum, which helps abused animals.
‚ùó At Riot, we try to create a safe space where you can meet, network, educate, strengthen friendships and most importantly - inspire each other and give each other the courage to face all the injustices. We can organize and face it all TOGETHER!

üî• Sexist and homophobic behavior and insinuations are not tolerated at the event!

ü§ù The event is organized by Mad Duck booking, Cross Club, people from Saturday groups Food Not Bombs Prague and the autonomous collective Vegan Burger Days.

We offer absolutely FREE space WITHOUT RENT for all merch stands, entertainment, independent workshops, info stands, non-profits... Write to zefv@zizkovskanoc.net
